intro: Deep in the forest, some little dragon friends discover a mysterious egg hidden among the leaves. Who could be inside?
description:
A magical visual novel set deep in the forest

One day, in a sparkling, hidden corner of the forest, some little dragons found something very special:
a mysterious egg, hidden among the leaves and surrounded by golden sparkles!

Intrigued, excited, and a little nervous, they decided to do something very brave:
Take care of it and protect it with all their hearts.
They knew that inside that egg could be a unique, perhaps even magical, creature!

While waiting for it to hatch, they lived an unforgettable adventure, filled with:

·Fun challenges: like building a warm nest with soft leaves and stray feathers.

·Laughable moments: when they tried to sing a lullaby to the egg, they sounded just like a frog!

·Many questions: What if what's born doesn't look like any of them? What if it doesn't love them?

But the most important thing they learned was this:

·What unites us is not how we look on the outside, but what we choose to nurture with love.

Finally, one day... the egg broke with a tiny crack!
And out came an adorable creature: a fluffy duckling!
It wasn't a dragon like them, but that didn't matter.
To them, it was already part of their family.
